desc: Being a young professional and trying to make my mark in a fast-paced and highly competitive industry, I began to notice the increasing amount of time I was spending daily on washing, blowing and straightening my hair. As I continued to make successful strides in my career and work began to require more and more of my

layout.text: Finley hair powder provides a simple and effective solution for dull and oily hair in between washes. Oversleeping with no time to shower or needing a quick refresher before heading out for the evening makes Finley hair powder the perfect weapon in your beauty arsenal.
